ComicInfo.Summary:
In "Dead Billy Dead, Part 7," the penultimate tale of the ongoing horror show that is Billy's life as a vampire, he attempts to put the literal pieces of his life back together. And in part 7 of "Juarez," you know those stories where all the characters, after struggling long and hard with great adversity both inside and out, have reached the end of their quest and experience a grand reward and are left changed, and better, people for it? This isn't one of those stories.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-02 09:32:55. [Issue ID 116295]
